data.text: The number of COVID-19 vaccine doses administered in mainland China grew by nearly 3.8 million on Sunday, taking the total to more than 3.16 billion, according to the data from the National Health Commission on Monday.
COVID-19 may lead to greater loss of grey matter and tissue damage in the brain compared to people not infected with the virus, a study published Monday in the journal Nature found.
But administrators in some cities like Newark, Paterson, and Trenton are still requiring students and staff to wear masks at school.
Students at most suburban schools in New Jersey were also allowed to attend classes Monday without masks for the first time since schools reopened during the pandemic.

For the first time in nearly two years, schoolchildren in New York City can return to school without masks. Children in the cityâ€™s  public schools now have the option to choose whether they wear masks.
